Episodes.Title: The Wounded Angel
Episodes.Writer: Peter Harness, Ragna Wei, Sean Jablonski
Episodes.Actors: Noomi Rapace, Jonathan Banks, James D'Arcy
Episodes.Plot: A disaster on board the International Space Station becomes a fight for survival.

Episodes.Title: Live and Let Die
Episodes.Writer: Peter Harness, Ragna Wei, Sean Jablonski
Episodes.Actors: Noomi Rapace, Jonathan Banks, James D'Arcy
Episodes.Plot: Jo races to find a way back to Earth before her life support runs out. Henry is concerned about his experiment.

Episodes.Title: Somewhere in Space Hangs My Heart
Episodes.Writer: Peter Harness, Ragna Wei, Sean Jablonski
Episodes.Actors: Noomi Rapace, Jonathan Banks, James D'Arcy
Episodes.Plot: The space agencies begin their investigation into the ISS collision. Jo struggles to reconnect with Magnus and Alice.

Episodes.Title: The Left Hand of God
Episodes.Writer: Peter Harness, Ragna Wei, Sean Jablonski
Episodes.Actors: Noomi Rapace, Jonathan Banks, James D'Arcy
Episodes.Plot: Jo's life back home is not how she remembers it, and growing tension with Magnus adds to her feelings of alienation.

Episodes.Title: Five Miles Out, the Sound Is Clearest
Episodes.Writer: Peter Harness, Ragna Wei, Sean Jablonski
Episodes.Actors: Noomi Rapace, Jonathan Banks, James D'Arcy
Episodes.Plot: On the lam, Jo finds a frightening revelation about Alice's past. Bud plans to settle the score with Henry.
